entities: United Nations Support Mission in Libya (UNSMIL)
summary:
The Security Council:

Recalling resolution 1970 (2011) and subsequent resolutions on Libya,
 
Extends until 31 March 2015:
 
- Authorizations provided by and measures imposed by resolution 2146 (2014)
- Mandate of UNSMIL, as set out in paragraph 6 of resolution 2144 (2014), under the leadership of the Special Representative of the Secretary-General

 Determines the situation in Libya continues to threaten international peace and security 

Remains seized of the matter.
